question: Overdose of antibiotics will cause the suppression of synthesis of which among the following vitamins in human body?
explanation: Overdose of antibiotics will cause the suppression of synthesis biotin in human body. Biotin is also known as vitamin H, vitamin B₇ or vitamin B₈ and is involved in a wide range of metabolic processes, primarily related to the utilization of fats, carbohydrates, and amino acids.
